Simulate killing monsters.

## /lb kc

**Usage**

- `/lb kc monster:<string> [ironmen_only:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `monster` | `string` | Yes | The monster you want to check the leaderboard of. | - |
| `ironmen_only` | `boolean` | No | Only include ironmen. | - |

## /lb sacrifice

**Usage**

- `/lb sacrifice type:<string> [ironmen_only:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `type` | `string` | Yes | The particular sacrifice leaderboard you want to check. | Most Value Sacrificed, Unique Items Sacrificed |
| `ironmen_only` | `boolean` | No | Only include ironmen. | - |

## /lb skills

**Usage**

- `/lb skills skill:<string> [xp:<boolean>] [ironmen_only:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `skill` | `string` | Yes | The skill you want to select. | Overall |
| `xp` | `boolean` | No | Show XP instead of levels. | - |
| `ironmen_only` | `boolean` | No | Only include ironmen. | - |
